long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows current weather conditions and a 5 day forecast for your location. 
This handy popup lets you check your weather from the toolbar of your browser! 

Features: 
- The current temperature is displayed over the toolbar weather icon. 
- Switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit.
- View the weather forecast for other locations by selecting locations from the menu. 
- Provides links to other tools from LinangData from the "More tools" menu, including: Color Picker, Grammar, spelling and style checker; Dictionary; Calculator; Photo Editor; Sketch;  PDF Generator; the LinangData Youtube channel; and our sponsors
- It's free!
